vanadium.config.title: Vanadium Configuration
vanadium.config.title.subtitle: Vanadium Options
vanadium.config.option.clearSky.desc: Use the sky color for fog.
vanadium.config.option.clearVoid.desc: Don't render the void, even when below sea level.
vanadium.config.option.blendSkyLight.des: Blend sky light smoothly during sunrise and sunset.
vanadium.config.option.relativeBlockLigh: The intensity of block light relative to sky light. Lower values make block light dimmer in ambient light.
vanadium.biomeBlendRadius.tooltip: Controls the blend radius used by Vanadium
